# shading

**Instance Property**

An optional shading to fill the image with.

## Declaration

```swift
var shading: GraphicsContext.Shading?
```

## Discussion

The value of this property defaults to [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/GraphicsContext/Shading/foreground] for template images, and to `nil` otherwise.

## Getting the image properties

- **size**: The size of the image.
- **baseline**: The distance from the top of the image to its baseline.

items.description: The distance from the top of the image to its baseline.
